creator: Libra Softworks
descriptionHtml:
Joy Blast is a real time killer bubble popping game with colorful and joyful theme.

It is very easy to play! Just pop groups of similarly colored bubbles with a simple tap and achieve level targets! You can also combine more bubbles to unleash boosters for huge explosions! You will have different level targets to achieve, it is challenging but very addictive!

If you are looking for fun in your day, you are in the right place! Just download Joy Blast and enjoy!

Joy Blast features:
- Simple gameplay : Just tap the matching bubbles and boom! ✨
- Tap a group of 4 or more bubbles to create boosters! 🚀
- Achieve level targets and win! 🏅
- There are also daily prizes for you! 😉

Coming Soon!: 📣
- Leaderboards: You will compete with your friends and players all over the world!
- New levels: We will add new levels every week! Stay tuned..

-----------------------
Joy Blast is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available.
-----------------------
descriptionShort: Here is the most entertaining & challenging NEW matching puzzle game JOY BLAST!

title: Joy Blast

container.value: Merdivenköy Mah. Dikyol Sk No:10, Yumurtacı Abdi Bey Cd., Business Istanbul B blok, Kat 15, 34732 Kadıköy/İstanbul

creator: Libra Softworks
descriptionHtml:
MATCH 3 GAME WITH A UNIQUE EXPERIENCE: Beat levels, travel the universe! Wonderful places are waiting for you to explore!

It is very easy to play! Just pop groups of similarly colored candy like bubbles with a simple tap and achieve level targets! You can also combine more bubbles to unleash boosters for huge explosions! You will have different level targets to achieve, it is challenging but very addictive!

If you are looking for fun in your day, you are in the right place! Just download Joy Blast and start crushing!

Joy Blast features:
- Simple gameplay : Just tap the matching bubbles and boom! ✨
- Tap a group of 4 or more bubbles to create boosters! 🚀
- Achieve level targets and win! 🏅
- Fun events every day 🎉
- Travel from your seat: Beat levels and complete cities, countries all over the universe! 🌍🪐🌕
- Leaderboards: Compete with your friends and players all over the world! 🏆
- There are also daily prizes for you! 😉

Coming Soon!: 📣
- New levels: We will add new levels every week! Stay tuned..

title: Joy Blast

container.value: Merdivenköy Mah. Dikyol Sk No:10, Yumurtacı Abdi Bey Cd., Business Istanbul B blok, Kat 15, 34732 Kadıköy/İstanbul

creator: Libra Softworks
descriptionHtml:
MATCH 3 ADVENTURE BLAST PUZZLE GAME WITH A UNIQUE EXPERIENCE: Beat match three levels and travel the universe! Wonderful places are waiting for you to explore in this unique match three puzzle adventure game with a gravity factor!

Play the challenging match 3 puzzle game!

Joy Blast, although challenging, is easy to master! Just combine, match & blast groups of similarly coloured candy-like bubbles with a simple tap, and achieve level targets by completing challenging puzzles! In each unique puzzle, combine four or more bubbles to unleash blast and colour match boosters for huge explosions! You will have different level targets to achieve, it is challenging but very addictive!

Build cities by collecting stars from each level!

In Joy Blast, the physics are realistic! Combine & blast the unique set of candy like bubbles where the coloured bubbles fall freely in every dimension - complete a level with limited moves. Help the rabbit, fox, and bear to make fun memories by completing challenging puzzles and collecting stars to build cities and continue their adventure. Travel across the universe by solving puzzles and become a master of match three!

Compete with your friends and other players!
Compare your progress against your friends and other players to become a match three master! The more puzzles you solve, the more trophies and points you earn. Add your friends to see who is a match master amongst you! Can you solve the puzzles better than them?

Start solving challenging colour match puzzles today! download Joy Blast - combine, match and blast away!

Some of Joy Blast game features:
✨Simple gameplay: Just tap the matching coloured bubbles and blast to achieve your goals! ✨
🚀Tap a group of 4 or more bubbles to create blast and colour match boosters! 🚀
🏅Achieve puzzle level targets, collect stars and create memories all over the world! 🏅
🎉 Fun events every day 🎉
🌍Travel from your seat: Beat levels and complete cities, countries all over the universe!
🏆Leaderboards: Compete with your friends and players all over the world! 🏆
😉There are also daily prizes for you! 😉
☄️Gravity factor allows the bubbles to fall realistically! ☄️

New levels: New puzzles are added every week! Download the Joy Blast Game and start your adventure!
descriptionShort: Addictive match 3 blast adventure game with fun mini-games and puzzle quest!

MATCH 3 ADVENTURE BLAST PUZZLE GAME WITH A UNIQUE EXPERIENCE: Beat match three levels and travel the universe! Wonderful places are waiting for you to explore in this unique match three puzzle adventure game with a gravity factor!

Play the challenging match 3 puzzle game!

Joy Blast, although challenging, is easy to master! Just combine, match & blast groups of similarly coloured candy-like bubbles with a simple tap, and achieve level targets by completing challenging puzzles! In each unique puzzle, combine four or more bubbles to unleash blast and colour match boosters for huge explosions! You will have different level targets to achieve, it is challenging but very addictive!

Build cities by collecting stars from each level!

In Joy Blast, the physics are realistic! Combine & blast the unique set of candy like bubbles where the coloured bubbles fall freely in every dimension - complete a level with limited moves. Help the rabbit, fox, and bear to make fun memories by completing challenging puzzles and collecting stars to build cities and continue their adventure. Travel across the universe by solving puzzles and become a master of match three!

Compete with your friends and other players!
Compare your progress against your friends and other players to become a match three master! The more puzzles you solve, the more trophies and points you earn. Add your friends to see who is a match master amongst you! Can you solve the puzzles better than them?

Start solving challenging colour match puzzles today! download Joy Blast - combine, match and blast away!

Some of Joy Blast game features:
✨Simple gameplay: Just tap the matching coloured bubbles and blast to achieve your goals! ✨
🚀Tap a group of 4 or more bubbles to create blast and colour match boosters! 🚀
🏅Achieve puzzle level targets, collect stars and create memories all over the world! 🏅
🎉 Fun events every day 🎉
🌍Travel from your seat: Beat levels and complete cities, countries all over the universe!
🏆Leaderboards: Compete with your friends and players all over the world! 🏆
😉There are also daily prizes for you! 😉
☄️Gravity factor allows the bubbles to fall realistically! ☄️

New levels: New puzzles are added every week! Download the Joy Blast Game and start your adventure!
descriptionShort: Enjoy solving challenging puzzles with Joy Blast in the fun match 3 blast game!

creator: Libra Softworks
descriptionHtml:
MATCH 3 ADVENTURE BLAST PUZZLE GAME WITH A UNIQUE EXPERIENCE: Beat match three levels and travel the universe! Wonderful places are waiting for you to explore in this unique match three puzzle adventure game with a gravity factor!

Easy to play, yet challenging match 3 blast game!

Match, blast, and crush three or more groups of similarly colored candy like bubbles with a simple tap and achieve level targets by completing challenging puzzles! In each unique puzzle, combine four or more bubbles to unleash blast and color match boosters for huge explosions! You will have different level targets to achieve, it is challenging but very addictive!

Build cities by collecting stars from each level!

In Joy Blast, the physics are realistic! Combine & blast the unique set of candy-like bubbles where the colored bubbles fall freely in every dimension - complete a level with limited moves. Help our toons Rabbit, Fox, and Bear to make fun memories by completing challenging puzzles and collecting stars to build cities and continue their adventure. Travel across the universe by solving puzzles and become a master of the color match!

Compete with your friends and other players!
Compare your progress against your friends and other players to become a color match master! The more puzzles you solve, the more trophies and points you earn. Add your friends to see who is a matching master amongst you! Can you solve the puzzles better than them?

Start solving challenging color match puzzles today! download Joy Blast - combine, match and blast away!

Some of Joy Blast game features:
✨Simple gameplay: Just tap the matching colored bubbles and blast to achieve your goals! ✨
🚀Tap a group of 4 or more bubbles to create blast and color match boosters! 🚀
🏅Achieve puzzle level targets, collect stars and create memories all over the world! 🏅
🎉 Fun events every day 🎉
🌍Travel from your seat: Beat levels and complete cities, countries all over the universe!
🏆Leaderboards: Compete with your friends and players all over the world! 🏆
😉There are also daily prizes for you! 😉
☄️Gravity factor allows the bubbles to fall realistically! ☄️

Coming Soon!: 📣
- New levels: New puzzles are added every week! Download the Joy Blast Game and start your adventure!

descriptionHtml:
MATCH 3 BLAST PUZZLE GAME WITH A UNIQUE EXPERIENCE: Blast match three levels and help Joy create her dream story!! Wonderful stories are waiting for you to explore in this unique match three puzzle adventure game with a gravity factor!

Easy to play, challenging puzzle match 3 blast game!

Match, blast, and crush three or more groups of similarly colored candy like bubbles with a simple tap and achieve level targets by completing challenging puzzles! In each unique puzzle, combine four or more bubbles to unleash blast and color match boosters for huge explosions! You will have different level targets to achieve, it is challenging but very addictive!

Correct the Joy's childhood friends' story by collecting stars from each level!

In Joy Blast, the physics are realistic! Combine & blast the unique set of candy-like bubbles where the colored bubbles fall freely in every dimension - complete a level with limited moves. Help Joy to make fun memories by completing challenging puzzles and collecting stars to correct her story and continue her friends' adventure. Follow book pages solving puzzles and become a master of the color match blast!

Compete with your friends and other players!
